com.garygregg.coverity.codingtest.lexical_analysis

Interface ListenerCollection<Type>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    KeyTokenDispatcher, LexicalAnalyzer, ListenerDispatcher

    interface ListenerCollection<Type>
    Implements the abstraction of a listener collection.
    Author:
    Gary Gregg

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean addListener(Type listener)
      Adds a listener.
      int getListenerCount()
      Gets the listener count.
      boolean hasListeners()
      Determines if there are any listeners.
      boolean removeListener(Type listener)
      Removes a listener.

    • Method Detail

      • addListener

        boolean addListener(Type listener)
        Adds a listener.
        Parameters:
        listener - The listener to add
        Returns:
        True if the listener was non-null, and was not already added as a listener; false otherwise

      • getListenerCount

        int getListenerCount()
        Gets the listener count.
        Returns:
        The listener count

      • hasListeners

        boolean hasListeners()
        Determines if there are any listeners.
        Returns:
        True if there are one or more listeners, false otherwise

      • removeListener

        boolean removeListener(Type listener)
        Removes a listener.
        Parameters:
        listener - The listener to remove
        Returns:
        True if the listener was removed; false if it was not previously a listener
